module.name: Weak Password Detection
module.changelog: *2.11.0.1* relax sequential and repeated digits warning on long passwords *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.1* #4914 *2.9.0.0* 2.9 Update
module.description: This module detects weak SIP secrets and sets security notifications accordingly
